archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.3.5b: b) participating in information risk assessment activities (e.g. by helping to identify threats and vulnerabilities, determine potential business impacts, and develop risk treatment plans)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
